title: Comparisons: Speed (Usefulness 7)
description: Traveler usefulness 7/10 phrases for the Speed subcategory within Comparisons. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Which is faster, a bus or a train?
cards.romaji: Basu to densha, dochira no ho ga hayai desu ka.
cards.japanese: バスと電車、どちらの方が速いですか。
